actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the amount of the earned income tax credit will be related to family size.
short_title: Job Enhancement for Families Act of 1989

summary.text: Job Enhancement for Families Act of 1989 - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions governing the earned income tax credit to: (1) increase from $5,714 to $7,143 the amount of earned income subject to the credit; and (2) increase the credit percentage incrementally from 14 percent to 35 percent, adjusted annually for inflation, as the number of the taxpayer's dependent children increases from one to four or more.

titles.title: Job Enhancement for Families Act of 1989
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the amount of the earned income tax credit will be related to family size.
